title: 1. (1) This Order may be cited as the Business, Enterprise and Innovation
heading: 1. (1) This Order may be cited as the Business, Enterprise and Innovation
text_raw:
1. (1) This Order may be cited as the Business, Enterprise and Innovation 

(Alteration of Name of Department and Title of Minister) Order 2020. 

(2) This Order comes into operation on 10 November 2020.
text_norm: 1 (1) order may cited business enterprise innovation (alteration name department title minister) order 2020 (2) order come operation 10 november 2020

title: 1. (1) This Order may be cited as the Business, Enterprise and Innovation
heading: 2. The name of the Department of State, the present name of which is, in
text_raw:
2. The name of the Department of State, the present name of which is, in 
the Irish language, an Roinn Gnó, Fiontar agus Nuálaíochta and, in the English 
language, the Department of Business, Enterprise and Innovation, is altered, in 
the Irish language, to that of an Roinn Fiontar, Trádála agus Fostaíochta and, in 
the English language, to that of the Department of Enterprise, Trade and 
Employment.
text_norm: 2 name department state present name irish language roinn gno fiontar agus nualaiochta english language department business enterprise innovation altered irish language roinn fiontar tradala agus fostaiochta english language department enterprise trade employment

title: 1. (1) This Order may be cited as the Business, Enterprise and Innovation
heading: 3. The title of the Minister having charge of the Department of State,
text_raw:
3. The title of the Minister having charge of the Department of State, 
whose present title is, in the Irish language, an tAire Gnó, Fiontar agus 
Nuálaíochta and, in the English language, the Minister for Business, Enterprise 
and Innovation is altered, in the Irish language, to that of an tAire Fiontar, 
Trádála agus Fostaíochta and, in the English language, to that of the Minister 
for Enterprise, Trade and Employment.
text_norm: 3 title minister charge department state whose present title irish language taire gno fiontar agus nualaiochta english language minister business enterprise innovation altered irish language taire fiontar tradala agus fostaiochta english language minister enterprise trade employment

title: 1. (1) This Order may be cited as the Business, Enterprise and Innovation
heading: In any enactment or any instrument made under an enactment -
text_raw:
4. 

In any enactment or any instrument made under an enactment - 

(a) 

(b) 

references to the Department of Business, Enterprise and 
Innovation shall be construed as references to the Department of 
Enterprise, Trade and Employment; and 

to 

the Minister for Business, Enterprise and 
references 
Innovation shall be construed as references to the Minister for 
Enterprise, Trade and Employment. 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Government, 

10 November, 2020. 

MICHEÁL MARTIN, 

Taoiseach. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
 “Iris Oifigiúil” of 13th November, 2020.
